overview: As a technology executive with broad experience ranging from enterprise software to SaaS companies, Ashish has a keen interest in applying data to make decisions and measure their effectiveness across a number of fields, including software engineering, operations and software quality. He is a highly accomplished expert in building high-availability, scalable, cloud computing systems, having managed more than 40 major software releases and the successful buildout of multiple high-availability data centers over the course of his career. Ashish leads all aspects of Ringioâ€™s technology development, operations and finance. Prior to Ringio, Ashish was VP of Technology and Operations at Angel.com where he led the companyâ€™s operations, quality and software-engineering programs. Under Ashishâ€™s leadership, the Angel.com technology platform enabled revenue growth from zero to $12 million annually. He holds degrees in computer science from Albright College and Cornell University.

funding_round.source_description: Gmail Plugin Rapportive Raises Over $1 Million From Gmail Creator, Many Others
